Delegate.py¶

Code author: Majid Mallis

Created on:2009-08-14
class LSD_inputGUI.src.controller.Delegate.Delegate(parent)[source]¶

This class is responsible of controlling the user interaction with a QTreeView.(advTab.XMLView in this case)

commitAndCloseEditor()[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s commitAndCloseEditor method.

createEditor(parent, option, index)[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s createEditor method. Creates the widget when a user double click and item of the QTableView.

Parameters:
  • parent –
  • option –
  • index – see QItemDelegate’s doc for more information
setEditorData(editor, index)[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s setEditorData method. Sets the widget’s data after createEditor has created it

Parameters:
  • editor –
  • index – see QItemDelegate’s doc for more information
setModelData(editor, model, index)[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s setModelData method. Sets the model data after a user interaction with the editor :param editor: :param model: :param index: see QItemDelegate’s doc for more information
